plot: Six people, connected by blood or friendship, confront the harsh realities of their relationships and other intimacies set to the backdrop of the impending approval of gay marriage in New York.
plot_en: Six people, connected by blood or friendship, confront the harsh realities of their relationships and other intimacies set to the backdrop of the impending approval of gay marriage in New York.
plot_es: Six people, connected by blood or friendship, confront the harsh realities of their relationships and other intimacies set to the backdrop of the impending approval of gay marriage in New York.
title: Good People in Love
